pkgdown site of geffaeR to get the documentation of the functions and vignettes with example of the use of the package : [https://mathieugenu.github.io/geffaeR/](https://mathieugenu.github.io/geffaeR/)

## How to install **geffaeR**
```{r installation, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("MathieuGenu/geffaeR")
library(geffaeR)
```
